MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL15 and LL21 postcode areas of Ruthin and Corwen, affecting properties in Derwen and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.39PM on 6th November 2020.
